title: Leaked renders showcase the upcoming Xiaomi Watch S1 Active
content:
At the Xiaomi 12 series launch event in China late last year, Xiaomi also launched the Xiaomi Watch S1 — a premium smartwatch featuring a 1.43-inch AMOLED display, up to 117 workout modes, continuous heart rate monitoring, an SpO2 sensor, up to 12 days of battery life, a built-in app store, and more. The company

The post Leaked renders showcase the upcoming Xiaomi Watch S1 Active appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Leaked renders of the upcoming Xiaomi Watch S1 Active have surfaced online, giving us our first look at its design. Read on to learn more.
